amendment.description: To establish a reserve fund for immigration reform and enforcement.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4259 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 59.

action.text: Amendment SA 4259 proposed by Senator Menendez. (consideration: CR S1976-1980; text: S1976) To establish a reserve fund for immigration reform and enforcement.
